title: Fix user list to display all 7 users instead of only 2

requirements.summary: Fix the users list page to display all 7 added users instead of only showing 2 users
acceptanceCriteria: Users page displays all 7 users that were added to the system
No pagination or limit issues preventing full user list from being displayed
All user details (PayGo ID, Name, Email, Mobile, Role, Status) are visible for each user

file_operations.description: Review and fix the useListUsers query hook to ensure it correctly fetches and returns all users from the backend without any filtering or limiting. Verify the query is properly invalidated on user mutations and that the data transformation preserves all user records.

Review the UsersPage component to ensure it properly renders all users returned from useListUsers hook. Check for any filtering, slicing, or limiting logic that might be restricting the display to only 2 users. Verify the table rendering logic iterates over the complete users array without artificial limits. Ensure no state management issues are causing partial data display.
